page.shortlink: ux controlbar items common settings auto-hide disclosure property
page.description: Specify if the Disclosure should be closed when the disclosure button is tapped. If 'auto' then uses the *[ui:Auto-hide]* property defined on the 'disclosure-button'.
page.tip: To make the disclosure opened by this button behave as a MODAL dialog set this property to 'auto' and uncheck the *[ui:Auto-hide]* property.

item.name: always
item.description: Always auto-hide the disclosure when the disclosure button is tapped.

item.name: auto
item.description: Uses the behavior defined in the *[ui:Auto-hide]* property.
